sys_openapi_operation.name: Gets a list of disrupted streets. If no date filters are provided, current disruptions are returned.

openapi.display_value: Transport for London Unified API - v1

sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Gets a list of disrupted streets. If no date filters are provided, current disruptions are returned.
